Job Title: Business Process Manager

Location: Fairfax, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Management

Description:
Concept Plus is hiring a Business Process Manager (BPM) that will work as part of the Engineering Business Unit to lead and manage the enhancement of operational processes, increase efficiency, productivity, and quality in support of our Federal Government customers and corporate operations. The Business Process Manager works closely with Service Delivery Project Teams and Corporate Operations Teams to assess existing processes, identify areas for improvement, and implement changes that drive operational excellence. 
The Ideal Candidate Has: Demonstrated experience delivering Information Technology services to Federal Government customers in a CMMI-DEV Level 3 environment as either a Project Manager or in a project leadership role.Expertise in project management principles and practicesDemonstrated experience with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and methodologies, preferably in an Agile environment. Experience leading or managing quality programs based on ISO 9002:2015, with experience in ISO 2000-1, 27001.
Primary Responsibilities:  Work closely with Service Delivery Project Teams to gather insights into common practices, lessons learned, pain points and bottlenecks to continuously define and improve service delivery methodologies.Work closely with Service Delivery Project Teams to identify existing processes that need improvement through analysis, data collection, and feedback.Evaluate the efficiency, effectiveness, and compliance of current processes and practices per our organizationally defined CMMI-DEV Level 3 practices. Work with CP Corporate Operations Teams to develop “playbooks” ensuring SOPs and workflows are well-documented, streamlined, easily accessible and automated when possible.Secure buy-in for proposed process improvement changes. Identify and communicate the benefits of the process improvements and address concerns.Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation of processes and manage the corporateDocument Control System.Collects data to measure IMS effectiveness and maintain company-wide metrics to continuously improve performance. Maintain the Integrated Management System (IMS) and associated certifications (ISO 9001:2015, ISO 20000-1:2018, ISO 27001:2013 and CMMI-DEV Appraised Level 3).Manage IMS process improvement work items (e.g. Service Requests, Corrective Actions, Risk, and Opportunities for Improvements) through the lifecycle utilizing internal tools and application platforms.Maintain the corporate Integrated Management System (IMS) manuals, procedures, and all associated artifacts.Plan, conduct and facilitate IMS Management Reviews to corporate leadership and internal stakeholders. Required Qualifications:   Must be a US Citizen.BS in Information Technology (IT), Engineering, Business, or related field10+ years of working experience in the IT industry with experience in software engineering disciplines and SDLC. 4+ years of experience utilizing Process Improvement methodologies (e.g., Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI), ISO 9000, Six Sigma, Agile). Demonstrated experience on project teams implementing technology solutions and development/implementation of new work processes or process improvements.Demonstrated experience leading and maintaining CMMI-DEV Level 3 programs in an Agile software development environment. Demonstrated experience leading and conducting internal CMMI appraisals and/or quality assurance reviews. 
Preferred Qualifications CMMI Certification (e.g. Associate, Practitioner).Certified Project Management Professional (PMP)ISO 9001:2015 Lead Auditor or Internal Auditor certifications.Experience leading and maintaining ISO 9001, ISO 20000-1, ISO 27001 programs.Experience supporting external ISO audits and CMMI appraisals.Experience with audit report writing.Experience with Google Workspace (Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms), Atlassian (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Service Management). 
Concept Plus is a growing consulting firm headquartered in Fairfax, VA. We are an Oracle Gold Partner, offering deep technical expertise, combined with business insights and an experienced team focused on providing technical solutions for our clients. We are proud to have been recognized as one of the "25 Most Powerful Oracle Solution Providers" in the area! We offer great benefits including competitive pay, comprehensive health insurance, dental and vision insurance, paid life insurance, paid time off, 11 paid holidays, bonuses, tuition reimbursement, unlimited training, and the opportunity to work in a collaborative, flexible, innovative environment! For additional information about our dynamic organization, please visit our website at www.conceptplus.com.
Concept Plus is an Affirmative Action/Equal Opportunity Employer. As such, we will give your application full consideration without regard to your race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
